Super General 1.5 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SGST-1803 EB1) offers a 1-year warranty. Its rated capacity of 18000 BTU/h ensures rapid and effective cooling, making it suitable for a variety of room sizes. With a revolving compressor and R410a refrigerant, this Super General inverter air conditioner maximizes cooling while having the least detrimental effects on the environment. It can function at 220-240V, 50Hz, and 1Ph and is designed to fit a range of typical electrical configurations. Inverter technology provides dependable comfort by reducing power usage and increasing energy efficiency. Its 52dB sound level creates a serene and cozy environment for working or relaxing. To give customized comfort and hassle-free operation, this 1.5-ton split inverter air conditioner from Super General 1.5 Ton Inverter AC (Split Type SGST-1803-i) also contains functions like automatic drying, self-diagnosis, and comfortable sleeping settings. The washable and detachable panel promotes fresh, healthy air circulation in addition to making maintenance simpler.
